content: your favorite baby will be ready to go visiting in this attractive 4-piece crocheted outfit sweater soakers and bonnet with matching blanket will have friends and family cooing and it s oh so easy to make the instructions are written in plain english with no abbreviations let us know how you like them instructions are for infant s size changes needed for 6 months size and 1 year size are in parentheses gauge on size f hook measuring across 4 single_crochet stitches = 1 inch top to bottom 9 single_crochet row = 2 inches gauge on size g hook measuring across 7 single crochets = 2 inches top to bottom 4 single_crochet row = 1 inch
